review: Dr. Sunil Apsingi is a very patient friendly doctor. He treated me well and gave excellent support during and after the surgery, which was completed successfully. He also diagnosed the problem very efficiently and accurately. His focus is patient centric and he gives confidence to the patient. Overall a wonderful experience with Dr Sunil Apsingi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
